Bosses.Name: Wandil
Bosses.Strategy:
Everyone - Try not to spread out too much. Especially when *Tundra is in effect. Tundra+Cold Wave makes the arena really tight, so you want to try and drop the bombs in a close proximity to each other to give you space to move about.
When *Snowdrift is being cast start moving and don't stop until you see the visual effect, otherwise you will get a stack of *Frozen

Tank - Bring the boss close to the wall, but not on the wall (prep for *Tundra) & make sure the boss is facing away from the party so you don't cleave them.

Healer - Keep an eye on the parties *Frozen stacks. If they get 4, they will be stunned for ~10s. Be prepared to heal them. Also be careful about your own stacks as you may be stood still healing whilst *Snowdrift is rolling in. Also, give the DPS a hand with the *Frost bombs when you get a chance.

DPS - Make sure when the *Frost bombs spawn you put them down ASAP

Mechanics.Name: Snowdrift
Mechanics.Description: Raidwide attack - Moderate damage. If you are *not moving when the cast hits you will be inflicted with a stack of *Frozen. *Moving negates getting this stack. (PepeSad ;( Black Mages)

Mechanics.Name: Cold Wave
Mechanics.Description: AOE's on random players. Will inflict a stack of *Frozen if hit.

Mechanics.Name: Frost Bomb
Mechanics.Description: Frost bomb adds spawn. If not dealt with ASAP, will explode dealing damage & inflicting a stack of *Frozen on the party.

Mechanics.Name: Tundra
Mechanics.Description: At around ~40%% health the boss will shrink the arena. Standing on the ice will inflict you with a stack of *Frozen

Mechanics.Name: Frozen
Mechanics.Description: At *4 stacks of *Frozen you will be Frozen/Stunned for ~10s

Bosses.Name: Yeti
Bosses.Strategy:
Everyone - The boss has high defence so you have to utilize the *Snowball mechanic whilst DPS'ing. Work together to align *Spriggan Ice Cutters + *Frozen Mist attack to make snowballs. Subsequent hits by this attack will make the snowball larger, dealing more damage when it hits the boss. *DO NOT kill *Spriggan Ice Cutters.

Tank - You will juggling the boss position throughout the fight. When *Frozen Mist is being cast try and make it hit a *Spriggan. When *Buffet is being cast make sure it *DOES NOT hit a snowball.

Healer - Keep everyone topped up. If the boss is casting *Northerlies and DPS are busy, hit a snowball at the boss. (Face the boss whilst hitting the snowball)

DPS - As soon as the *Frostbound adds spawn, put them down. If the boss is casting *Northerlies, hit a snowball at the boss. (Face the boss whilst hitting the snowball)

Mechanics.Name: Buffet
Mechanics.Description: Frontal AOE cone - Moderate damage - If a *Snowball is hit with this it will destroy it (bad).

Mechanics.Name: Frozen Mist
Mechanics.Description: Frontal AOE cone - If a *Spriggan is hit by this they will turn into a *Snowball (good). Subsequent hits will make the Snowball larger (very good).

Mechanics.Name: Northerlies
Mechanics.Description: Raidwide attack - High damage. When the boss is casting this, hit him with a *Snowball to interrupt

Mechanics.Name: Adds
Mechanics.Description:
Spriggan Ice Cutter - *DO NOT kill these. Instead try and coordinate with the *Tank to line up *Frozen Mist

Frostbound - These will attempt to destroy the *Snowballs, put them down ASAP.

Bosses.Name: Fenrir
Bosses.Strategy:
Everyone - When the *Ice Shards appear, pay attention. 2 of them will target random players with a line AOE. The final shard has a delayed circle AOE. Every other *Ice Shard phase the boss will cast *Lunar Cry. Hide behind the pillar which did NOT have a line AOE to dodge this, once the boss has finished that attack, run away as the shard will explode soon after.

Tank - Make sure to keep the boss facing away from the party, so you don't accidentally cleave them.

Healer - Try and keep everyone topped up as most mechanics do a large amount of damage. Also, try and hold onto *Swiftcast so you can rez players fast as *Lunar Cry will kill anybody hit by it.

DPS - Do damage & do the mechanics correctly. Less healing from the healer means a faster clear.

Mechanics.Name: Ecliptic Bite
Mechanics.Description: Frontal cleave - Moderate damage. Used after *Lunar Cry. Damage is scaled by how many players are hit by the exploding shard.

Mechanics.Name: Ice Shards
Mechanics.Description:
Telegraphed. 3 crystals will appear. 2 of which will target 2 random players with a line AOE. The final crystal will have a delayed circle AOE. If you are hit by the final circle AOE shard you will be hit by *Ecliptic Bite after. (Almost guaranteed death unless you are the Tank.)

The following attacks will swap back and forth each crystal phase.

Mechanics.Name: Lunar Cry
Mechanics.Description: Raidwide damage - Instant kill if hit by it. This can be dodged by hiding behind the pillar that didn't have a line AOE.
